name: Kickthrough Racers
overview:
Kickthrough Racers is a Racing game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 2011.

Kick Through Racers Arcade Machine is an exiting new racing game that will appeal to the whole family. Players kick down on the scooters pedal to accelerate and race to the finish line.

Collect items around the various courses for power ups such as "extra speed" and "jumps".

Kick through racers can also link 2 cabinets together allowing for up to 4 players to race simultaneously.
